text:
Hi Everyone! My name is Phil and I'm very new to HubSpot dev life from software engineering. I was wondering if someone could explain how to effectively make a custom search module/component?

I've created one that looks ok, but once I drag and drop into a Page, it's got a disgusting blue background and I have no way to change it in that place. Help!

Pics below thanks!
You can style the search module using CSS. Cloning the default module will also give you more contorl.
That's what I did in the second pic, but once I drop it into the page it looks like that.
I'm still not sure where this blue background is coming from..
